Types.name: Application package
Types.description: Applies quantum technology to real-world use cases

Types.name: Compute provider
Types.description: Provides access to remote quantum computers or simulators

Types.name: Converter
Types.description: Converts Qiskit objects (such as QuantumCircuit) for use in other programs

Types.name: Transpiler plugin
Types.description: Extends Qiskit's transpiler to compile and optimize quantum circuits

Subjects.name: Error correction
Subjects.description: Performs or investigates quantum error correction

Subjects.name: Machine learning
Subjects.description: Uses or applies to machine learning

Subjects.name: Optimization
Subjects.description: Applies quantum computing to optimization problems

Subjects.name: Quantum information
Subjects.description: Includes tools for quantum information experiments
